itemDescription: British merchant seaman, George Cross recipient in World War II

wikipedia_page.main: Captain (then Chief Officer) George Preston Stronach GC (14 April 1912 – 12 December 1999)  of the Merchant Navy was awarded the George Cross for the heroism he displayed in a rescue at sea in Tripoli Harbour on 19 March 1943.  Notice of his award appeared in the London Gazette on 23 November 1943.

link_mentions.page: List of works by Terence Cuneo

* George Stronach (1912–1999), British Merchant Navy officer
